title: test log wrapper does not contain jemalloc
body:
## Bug Report

**What did you do?**

make test

**What did you expect to see?**

all tests passed

**What did you see instead?**

```
error: ./target/debug/log_wrappers-277edbd461a788c9 does not contain jemalloc
```

Do we need to exclude this test from jemalloc checking?
